summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Boekhouding (Accounting) module completed. All 12 features tested successfully - Dashboard, sidebar navigation, all sub-modules (Grootboek, Debiteuren, Crediteuren, Bank/Kas, Verkoop, Wisselkoersen, Rapportages, BTW), CBvS exchange rate fetching, and PDF invoice download.

passed: Boekhouding Dashboard loads with KPI cards (Openstaande Debiteuren, Crediteuren, Bank/Kas Saldo, BTW Positie)
Sidebar navigation works to all 9 sub-modules (Dashboard, Grootboek, Debiteuren, Crediteuren, Bank/Kas, Verkoop, Wisselkoersen, Rapportages, BTW)
Wisselkoersen page loads with CBvS button and exchange rate cards
CBvS Ophalen button fetches real exchange rates from Central Bank of Suriname (6 koersen opgehaald)
Exchange rates displayed: EUR → SRD 44.0620, USD → SRD 5.1910
Debiteuren page shows customer list with search, filter, and Nieuwe Debiteur button
Debiteur creation works - created Test Klant BV (K00001)
Crediteuren page shows supplier list with Nieuwe Crediteur button
Verkoopfacturen page shows invoices with Nieuwe Factuur button
Invoice creation works - created VF2026-00001 for SRD 250,00
Invoice Verzenden (send) functionality works - status changes from concept to verzonden
PDF download button appears after invoice is verzonden
Bank page shows bank accounts with Importeren and Nieuwe Rekening buttons
Grootboek page shows chart of accounts with grouped view (Activa section with 26 rekeningen)
Grootboek has 3 tabs: Rekeningschema, Dagboeken, Journaalposten
BTW page shows VAT module with BTW Aangifte, BTW Codes, Controlelijst tabs
BTW Aangifte shows calculation sections for BTW op Verkopen and BTW Aftrek
Rapportages page shows Balance Sheet (Balans) and P&L (Winst & Verlies) reports
Rapportages has period selectors and Genereren buttons

seed_data_creation: Created test debiteur 'Test Klant BV' (K00001) and test invoice VF2026-00001 (SRD 250,00)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Boekhouding module fully functional. Test user testboek@test.com has one debiteur (Test Klant BV) and one invoice (VF2026-00001, status: verzonden). CBvS exchange rate integration working with real Central Bank of Suriname API.
